name: In a Barrel
description:
The depths call to you! Can you collect a 10/10 photo of each type of creature?

In a Barrel is a relaxing photography game about taking pictures of cool sea dwellers.

How to play

Your goal is to get a 10/10 photo of each of the 6 types of creatures. You can find each pair in a different layer of the ocean. Photos are scored based on framing and creature presence.

Use your mouse to look around and W/S to move forward/back.

  • Press Q to toggle your Camera!
  • Once your camera is open, click to take a photo.
  • Press E to toggle your Creature Collection
  • Press left/right or a/d or click the arrows to scroll through your Collection.

Made in 72 hours from scratch for Ludum Dare 48 for the theme "Deeper and Deeper".

Tools:
  • Unity 2020
  • Krita
  • FL Studio
  • Blender 2.8
  • Shapes
  • DOTween
  • OdinInspector
